T02D2710:77a-1: bhag b'an a'arya manydzu shr'i s'a dhishth'a na stu ti //
T02D2710:77a-3: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa /
T02D2710:77a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag tshal lo //
T02D2710:77a-5: 'jam dbyangs phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
T02D2710:77a-6: rnams kyis bstod par gyur mod de lta na 'ang
T02D2710:77a-7: // bsam pa blun po'ang bla ma la gus dbang
T02D2710:77a-8: gis kyang ni khyod kyi yon tan brjod bgyi ste
T02D2710:77a-9: // // rab tu dregs bcas ngang pa'i rgyal po'i
T02D2710:77a-10: sde dag gis bsten chu dang ldan pa'i yid bzhin
T02D2710:77a-11: // // mtshor // bzhad rnams kyang ni yid la
T02D2710:77a-12: rab tu dga' ba bskyed de rgyu zhing rnam par
T02D2710:77a-13: // // mtshor // gnas par bgyid // zur phud
T02D2710:77a-14: gsal ldan gser mchog snyan chas legs par rnam brgyan
T02D2710:77a-15: mgul ni rab tu sgeg bcas shing //
T02D2710:77a-16: snyan gyi gong rgyan autpal mdzes 'dra mnga' slad khyod ni gzhon nur rab grags de lta na'ang //
T02D2710:77b-0: kun tu bzang po 'jig rten @77b dbang phyug rdo
T02D2710:77b-1: rje 'dzin sogs rnga yab mchog tu mdzes 'dzin pa'i
T02D2710:77b-2: // mkhas pa rnams kyis bla ma lta bur 'khor
T02D2710:77b-3: gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su khyod ni bsten par gyur
T02D2710:77b-4: // // do shal phreng ba'i sil sil sgrogs byed
T02D2710:77b-5: mchog tu dga' skyed snyan gdub mnga' ba spyi gtsug
T02D2710:77b-7: dang ldan gzhon nu'i na tshod dge legs mnga' ba
T02D2710:77b-8: // // gi // gang na yang // bcom ldan
T02D2710:77b-9: sa gsum dag na gus pas phyag byar 'os pa
T02D2710:77b-10: khyod ni rtse gcig nyer zhi yi //
T02D2710:77b-11: snod gyur mchod par 'os 'di gang na 'ang de
T02D2710:77b-12: slad su zhig ngo mtshar ci phyir skye mi 'gyur
T02D2710:77b-13: // shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan sprul stong dag
T02D2710:77b-14: gi chun po gdu bur byas pa 'dzin mdzad cing
T02D2710:77b-15: // // rno ba'i mtshon bsnams g-yul ngor rab dpa'
T02D2710:77b-16: gshin rje rnams ni rab tu skrag par mdzad pa
T02D2710:77b-17: // // yi // mi bzad 'phags pa gshin rje'i
T02D2710:77b-18: gshed dang bcas par gyur kyang khyod ni zhi ba'i
T02D2710:77b-20: tshogs kun yongs rdzogs lus ldan ston ka'i zla ba
T02D2710:77b-21: nya ba lta bur gyur pa lags //
T02D2710:77b-22: khyod ni chos lam nye bar ston la mkhas kyang chos 'dir 'ga' yang gzigs pa yod ma yin //
T02D2710:77b-23: khyod ni sems can phan la dgyes kyang sems can nyid ni 'ga' yang dmigs par gyur ma lags //
T02D2710:77b-24: bde gshegs dgyes pa phan tshun du ni 'grigs 'gyur ba'i mdzad spyod mang po 'di 'gal bas //
T02D2710:77b-25: khyod ni sa gsum ngo mtshar rgyu gcig gyur pa
T02D2710:77b-26: de slad khyod 'dir bsnyen par bgyid pa la lags
T02D2710:77b-27: // gzhan don 'bras bu smin pas shing bzhin rnam
T02D2710:77b-28: par gnas pas gangs chen lta bur gyur ba ste
T02D2710:77b-29: // // brtan pa yi ni ri rab dang 'dra
T02D2710:77b-30: grub pas bsten pas ri rgyal ma la ya dang
T02D2710:77b-31: // // mtshungs // gti mug rab rib zhi bar
T02D2710:77b-32: mdzad pas nyi ma bzhin te phun sum tshogs gzugs
T02D2710:77b-34: gzhan don mdzad slad 'gro na byis pa rol 'dra'i
T02D2710:77b-35: mdzad pa yis ni rnam par rgyu //
T02D2710:77b-36: dri zhim gyis bsgos mchog tu mdzes pa'i autpal sngon po bsnams pas rdzing bu lta bu ste //
T02D2710:77b-37: shin tu rnam sgeg tshul dang ldan pas yul gyi byis pa lo brgyad lon pa dang 'dra zhing //
T02D2710:77b-38: chos char dri ma med pa 'bebs pas char sprin 'brug sgra rab tu sgrogs pa lta bu dang //
T02D2710:77b-39: ngang pa'i rgyal po yid 'ong sgra skad zil gnon gsung mnga' khyod la su zhig bsnyen mi bgyid //
T02D2710:78a-0: skad cig nyid la yongs su 'bar gyur @78a * //
T02D2710:78a-1: gti mug rab rib skad cig nyid la zad gyur cing //
T02D2710:78a-2: thams cad du ni legs pa'i lam ston bde gshegs sdig med mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na //
T02D2710:78a-3: gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin 'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis legs par spras par gyur pa yi //
T02D2710:78a-4: khyod nyid gcig pu phyogs bcu rnams na da lta mchog tu snang bar mdzad pa ma lags sam //
T02D2710:78a-5: mgon po kye ma khyod gzugs ri mor byas pas kyang ni ji ltar tshim pa skyed byed ltar //
T02D2710:78a-6: ston ka'i mtshan mo dkar zhing rab tu mdzes par gyur pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lags te //
T02D2710:78a-7: autpal sngon po mdzes pa'i dri ngad zhim pos bsgos pa'i ser bu'i dad kyang ma lags shing //
T02D2710:78a-8: lha yi bu mos bstabs par gyur pa'i ha ri tsandan dri bzangs ldan pa'ang de lta min //
T02D2710:78a-9: gzhon nu khyod zhabs sen mo'i 'od zer phreng ba rgya chen thun mtshams su shar zla 'od bzhin //
T02D2710:78a-10: shin tu yid 'ong dkar dmar mdog can rab btud lha dang lha min gtsug nor 'od zer dang //
T02D2710:78a-11: 'dres pas gang reg ral pa can gyi mi de dag kyang skye bo kun gyis phyag byar 'os //
T02D2710:78a-12: mgon po khyod kyi sngags 'dzin grub pa thob nas rab chags sgeg pa las byung ba'i //
T02D2710:78a-13: gom tshugs kyis 'gro rgyan phreng rkang gdub yid 'phrog dang ldan mdzes ma brgya dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2710:78a-14: sa stengs na rol gzhan ni lha yi dbang pos tsandan gtul ba'i dri zhim dang ldan pa'i //
T02D2710:78a-15: li shi me tog dri ldan sbrang mas dkrigs pa'i tsandan gyi ni nags na gnas par byed //
T02D2710:78a-16: na tshod gzhon zhing dregs dang bcas pas sgeg cing
T02D2710:78a-17: rnam par 'phye na byed gsal bar byas gyur pa'i
T02D2710:78a-18: // dri zhim la ni chags pa skyed byed sbrang
T02D2710:78a-19: ma'i tshogs rnams kyis ni rab tu dkrigs gyur cing
T02D2710:78a-20: // // pi wang gling bu ngang pa'i rgyal po
T02D2710:78a-21: dang 'dra shin tu snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan gyur
T02D2710:78a-22: // // ba'i // gnod sbyin bu mo mchog kyang
T02D2710:78a-23: khyod kyi sngags bzlas pa yi mi yis rab tu
T02D2710:78a-25: gsum gyi mgon po 'bras bu med pa'i mang du
T02D2710:78a-26: brjod pa yis ni ci bgyir mchis //
T02D2710:78a-27: khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yang yang brjod par thub pa'i mkhyen pas spyod pa ma lags pa //
T02D2710:78a-28: de phyir 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi yon tan 'di tsam zhes bya bdag gis rtogs par nus ma lags //
T02D2710:78a-29: kun nas dpag med chu dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho
T02D2710:78b-0: las ni phan tshun 'gro ba bsgral @78b ba'i phyir
T02D2710:78b-1: // mgon po sems dang bcas pa'i mi rnams dag
T02D2710:78b-2: las su zhig 'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal bar bgyid
T02D2710:78b-3: // // de ltar bcom ldan 'das ni mgon po
T02D2710:78b-4: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la mngon par bstod pa bgyid pa
T02D2710:78b-5: // // las // bdag gis dge ba gang zhig
T02D2710:78b-6: bsags pa des ni 'gro ba kun gyi rnyog pa
T02D2710:78b-7: // // las // zhi gyur cig // de yis
T02D2710:78b-8: bdag kyang skye ba dang ni skye bar brtan zhing
T02D2710:78b-9: mtshungs pa med pa'i snyan dngags dang //
T02D2710:78b-10: rigs dang ldan zhing tshe rabs dran dang snying rje
T02D2710:78b-11: rgya chen yid 'phrog pa dang ldan par shog /
T02D2710:78b-12: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod
T02D2710:78b-13: pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa snyan dngags mkhan rnams
T02D2710:78b-14: kyi gtsug gi nor bu byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
T02D2710:78b-15: can mkhas pa chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa
T02D2710:78b-17: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po sum ti k'i rti'i zhal snga nas /
T02D2710:78b-18: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab dang /
